lines.text: I'm gonna pull the chain on you, pal. And you wanna know why? 'Cause you're fucking up my city. 'Cause you're walking all over people like you own them. And you wanna know the worst part? You're from out of state.
Sharky, I hit his ass. He's got four bullets in him, and the fucker won't go down!
Maybe he knows more about Zen than we do!
Do you think I will live... or die?
Ah, you'll die all right!
No, I don't think so. No, not by you!
This is all you know, isn't it? Pushing, hitting, and punching! Does it make you feel good or something?
Sometimes, yes!
You all right, partner?
Of course not, you asshole. I'm shot!
You know Frisco, when we used to flush the toilet upstairs, we always wondered where it came to...
Sharky...
Yeah?
When you find him, you got to put him down.
I'll put him down!
Sharky...
Yeah?
Put his ass in the ground, you hear me?
Yeah.
Sharky...
Yeah?
I'm talking about burying him and putting a stake through his fucking heart, because he's not real.
I hear you, Arch!
[Sharky leaves]
Sharky... Hey, Sharky!... I think I ruined a perfectly good jacket.
Paco?
[Asian thug shows off some butterfly knife flipping in front of Sharky]
What is he auditioning for a job at Benihana's?
